briefdescription.para: Interface function to enable the pwm output and pwm input caputure timers.
Initalizes the pwm input capture timer (timer9)
Interrupt Handler for the timer interrupt.
Sets the pwm output timer frequency.
sets the timer output pwm dutycycle

Interface function for IsoGuard-Driver The IsoGuard-Driver uses a start PWM-measurement function However, on the STM32F4 CPU the PWM-measurement does not need to be started repeatedly. Inits PWM input capture, if it is not yet initialized.
Gets duty cycle data of PWM-measurement Interface function for IsoGuard-Driver.

parameterdescription.para: pointer where duty cycle data is stored

simplesect.para: E_OK if duty cycle data is valid, E_NOT_OK if duty cycle data is invalid

briefdescription.para: Driver to enable/disable/change the peripheral timers.
